Each of the three programs outlined in your recent memo
appear to be worthy projects to me. The W5UI series might be
a trifle esoteric but I consider part of our "raison d’etre"
the programming of such broadcasts. Both the Chicago book
program and the Woodrow Wilson lecture series sound very worth¬
while .
Hope the Christmas holiday was a pleasant one for you.
Sincerely, /j
/Jim Slack
Network Acceptance Committee
